name: Super League
overview: Football management games come and go, however SUPER LEAGUE has to be the ultimate soccer management simulation. FEATURES INCLUDE - Organised Crime: Will you 'throw the game’ or suffer 'The Firms' painful consequences. - Will your club survive the introduction of the loathed membership card scheme. - Can you afford to modernise your grounds, keeping pace with the demands of the fans. All these elements and many of the more traditional features combine to produce one of the most accurate and challenging games on the market.
